attributes.action: Dear Sir,We the people would like you to put a preservation order on the last Great Western built steam shed at Old Oak Common depot.This shed was built by GJ Churchwood for the Great Western Railway in 1906 and now faces demolition from the Cross Rail project that has been sanctioned by your Goverment.This shed is the last one left standing,so we need to make sure it will last for other generations to visit and use this shed for the preservation of Locomotives and the public to enjoy the shed in its formers glory.So with your help we can save the shed.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Cross Rail have now purchased the site from English Welsh & Scottish Railways,so the site will become a building site and the shed will be demolished if we save it now.So would you please help us save our heritage from the bulldozers.

rejection.details: Please review the wording of your title.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
